full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SGROL DKAR DANG TSE DPAG MED KYI TSE SGRUB NGAG 'DON KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS DKA' BCU SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR DANG, ,DBU MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS PA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYI RIM GROR PHRAL DU TSE SGRUB DGOS SKABS TSOGS PA'I @004A *, ,ZHAL 'DON DU 'DRI 'DRA DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, ,DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL PHYIR BKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BZANG PO DANG, ,DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG DON GRUB GNYIS KYIS SA PHO RTA'I LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I YAR NGO'I TSES LA DBAR DU BSGRUBS,, ,,)
